title: Warning issued as researchers reveal another potential treatment for coronavirus
description: Health authorities are warning people against self-medicating with a drug traditionally used to treat head lice and scabies but now showing promise as a coronavirus treatment, saying it can be fatal.
content:
Posted 
April 04, 2020 15:19:18
Health authorities are warning people against self-medicating with a drug which is traditionally used to treat head lice and scabies but is now showing promise as a coronavirus treatment, saying it could be fatal.
